select a.username, name, user_picture, description, b.example_id, example_name, label, img, b.favorites, b.create_time, b.update_time from account a left join example b on a.username=b.username left join content c on b.example_id=c.example_id where b.example_name like concat('%',#{queryContent},'%')
or b.label like concat('%',#{queryContent},'%')
or a.name like concat('%',#{queryContent},'%')
order by b.create_time desc
order by b.update_time desc
order by b.favorites desc

select a.username, name, user_picture, description, a.example_id, example_name, label, img, a.favorites from example a left join favorites b on a.example_id = b.example_id left join account c on a.username = c.username where b.username = #{username}
order by b.create_time desc
order by b.update_time desc
order by b.favorites desc
